name: Mini Dice Battle
description:
Come & challenge Fate on the field of battle !

Gather coins to recruit more fighters & use the power of dices to command your troops.

Kill every last enemy standing in order to reach glory  !

But be wary ! For the battlefield is treacherous & will shrink on you ! Forcing you into a glorious but deadly melee...

Onward Generals ! And may the gods of random be ever in your favor !

Controls

LMB : Pick / Use / Move 

RMB : Cancel fighter purchase

Game Made in 48h for the GMTK GameJam 2022.

Theme : Roll of the dice
